alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 3:28PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 400 PM EST... At 328 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake George, or near Salt Springs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, Fruitland, Lake Como and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
